sn2.23:1.1: Ekamantam thito kho seri devaputto bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn2.23:8.1: Bhutapubbaham, bhante, siri nama raja ahosim dayako danapati danassa vannavadi.
sn2.23:8.2: Tassa mayham, bhante, catusu dvaresu danam diyittha samanabrahmanakapanaddhikavanibbakayacakanam.
sn2.23:8.3: Atha kho mam, bhante, itthagaram upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn2.23:8.4: ‘devassa kho danam diyati; amhakam danam na diyati.
sn2.23:8.5: Sadhu mayampi devam nissaya danani dadeyyama, punnani kareyyama’ti.
sn2.23:8.9: So khvaham, bhante, pathamam dvaram itthagarassa adasim.
sn2.23:8.10: Tattha itthagarassa danam diyittha; mama danam patikkami.
sn2.23:9.1: Atha kho mam, bhante, khattiya anuyanta upasankamitva etadavocum:
sn2.23:9.2: ‘devassa kho danam diyati; itthagarassa danam diyati; amhakam danam na diyati.
sn2.23:9.3: Sadhu mayampi devam nissaya danani dadeyyama, punnani kareyyama’ti.
sn2.23:9.7: So khvaham, bhante, dutiyam dvaram khattiyanam anuyantanam adasim.
sn2.23:9.8: Tattha khattiyanam anuyantanam danam diyittha, mama danam patikkami.
sn2.23:10.1: Atha kho mam, bhante, balakayo upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn2.23:10.2: ‘devassa kho danam diyati; itthagarassa danam diyati; khattiyanam anuyantanam danam diyati; amhakam danam na diyati.
sn2.23:10.3: Sadhu mayampi devam nissaya danani dadeyyama, punnani kareyyama’ti.
sn2.23:10.7: So khvaham, bhante, tatiyam dvaram balakayassa adasim.
sn2.23:10.8: Tattha balakayassa danam diyittha, mama danam patikkami.
sn2.23:11.1: Atha kho mam, bhante, brahmanagahapatika upasankamitva etadavocum:
sn2.23:11.2: ‘devassa kho danam diyati; itthagarassa danam diyati; khattiyanam anuyantanam danam diyati; balakayassa danam diyati; amhakam danam na diyati.
sn2.23:11.3: Sadhu mayampi devam nissaya danani dadeyyama, punnani kareyyama’ti.
sn2.23:11.7: So khvaham, bhante, catuttham dvaram brahmanagahapatikanam adasim.
sn2.23:11.8: Tattha brahmanagahapatikanam danam diyittha, mama danam patikkami.
sn2.23:12.1: Atha kho mam, bhante, purisa upasankamitva etadavocum:
sn2.23:12.2: ‘na kho dani devassa koci danam diyati’ti.
sn2.23:12.3: Evam vuttaham, bhante, te purise etadavocam:
sn2.23:12.4: ‘tena hi, bhane, yo bahiresu janapadesu ayo sanjayati tato upaddham antepure pavesetha, upaddham tattheva danam detha samanabrahmanakapanaddhikavanibbakayacakanan’ti.
sn2.23:12.5: So khvaham, bhante, evam digharattam katanam punnanam evam digharattam katanam kusalanam dhammanam pariyantam nadhigacchami—
sn2.23:12.6: ettakam punnanti va ettako punnavipakoti va ettakam sagge thatabbanti vati.
